unique_property: SAFE FOR SEVERE PCN ALLERGY - No cross-reactivity with beta-lactams

contraindications.note: NO cross-reactivity with penicillins or cephalosporins. Safe for severe PCN allergy including anaphylaxis.

severe_pcn_allergy.critical_note: Aztreonam is the PREFERRED beta-lactam alternative for severe PCN allergy
severe_pcn_allergy.evidence: Monobactam structure different from penicillins/cephalosporins. No cross-reactivity.

mild_pcn_allergy.note: Also safe for mild allergy, but cephalosporins are usually first choice

pregnancy_notes: Safe in pregnancy. Good alternative when fluoroquinolones contraindicated.

pneumonia.note: For severe PCN allergy with atypical coverage from another agent

intra_abdominal.note: MUST combine with metronidazole for anaerobic coverage + vancomycin for gram-positive
intra_abdominal.critical_note: Aztreonam has NO anaerobic or gram-positive coverage

spectrum.critical_gap: Must combine with other agents for gram-positive and anaerobic coverage

typical_combinations: Aztreonam + Vancomycin + Metronidazole (broad-spectrum for severe allergy)

notes: FIRST-LINE for severe PCN allergy (anaphylaxis, SJS, DRESS)
NO gram-positive or anaerobic coverage - needs combination therapy
evidence: FDA approved for severe beta-lactam allergy
